screensaver.name: xearth
screensaver._description: XEarth draws an image of the Earth, as seen from your favorite vantage point in space, correctly shaded for the current position of the Sun. Written by Kirk Johnson. This is not included with the XScreenSaver package, but if you don't have it already, you can find it at <http://www.cs.colorado.edu/~tuna/xearth/>.
